channel.title: TNS-12543 on amardeepsidhu.com

item.title: TNS-12543: TNS:destination host unreachable
item.description:
Scenario : Setting up a physical standby from Exadata to a non-Exadata single instance. tnsping from standby to primary works fine but tnsping from primary to standby fails with:

[sql]TNS-12543: TNS:destination host unreachable[/sql]

I am able to ssh standby from primary, can ping as well but tnsping doesn’t work. Â From the error description we can figure out that something is blocking the access. In this case it was iptables that was enabled on the standby server.
